channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Okay..How would I make an Aggressive Npc, how do I edit his stats/max hit, [s]And how would I make him Drop things?[/s] 2) I was going to try to make my OWN pking rewards system, I would Probably put it in the music tab as nothing is in there. But I Dont know where I would start..If anyone Could get me started (don't just give me a code to copy and paste, I want to do this on my own) It would be GREATLY appreciated.
[s]3) Is there a way I can make a mod/admin command that makes you completely invisible? [/s]
4) Is there a way I can make the wilderness so it tells you how deep you are, and make it so that you have to be a few levels away to be able to attack the other person? ( Sorry if that didn't make any sense, "I'm wanting my wilderness to be just like RuneScape's Wilderness") Thanks for any of your help :)

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Thaks Ownage, It Worked :)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 03:29:04 PM[/size][hr]Added a new question (Sorry about the double post :o)

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

if (command.startsWith("show") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

hey

npcdrop = 175 5 954 1 313 1 946 1 436 1 3049 1 2677 1 goto ur npcdrop and figure this code out enjoy! lol and u still didnt answer my max cb question and i heard of this server like every kill u get, u get like 2 skulls and you can trade em for shit…if u find out tell me ok?

@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Okay…How would I make an Aggressive Npc, how do I edit his stats/max hit, And how would I make him Drop things?
2)
I was going to try to make my OWN pking rewards system, I would Probably put it in the music tab as nothing is in there. But I Dont know where I would start…If anyone Could get me started (don’t just give me a code to copy and paste, I want to do this on my own) It would be GREATLY appreciated.
